heading: Black Asylum Dungeon Guide
content: Black Asylum features one of the best early leveling aspects for Necromancer, . This alone as Necromancer will make you want to complete it right away on any playthrough and imbue with the as soon as possible. On the other hand, the mediocre layout makes this dungeon a poor choice for repeated grinding, so this one is a one-and-done deal. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
